import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MissingVariantsChecker(){const[missingVariants,setMissingVariants]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const checkMissingVariants=async()=>{const serverUrl="https://api.malidag.com";// Backend server URL
try{const response=await fetch(`${serverUrl}/check-variants`);if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Error fetching missing variants");}const data=await response.json();setLoading(false);if(data.missingVariants&&data.missingVariants.length>0){setMissingVariants(data.missingVariants);}else{setMissingVariants([]);}}catch(error){setLoading(false);console.error("Error checking missing variants:",error);alert("Error fetching missing variants.");}};checkMissingVariants();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Missing Variants Checker"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):missingVariants.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{backgroundColor:"#ffcccc",padding:"10px",borderRadius:"5px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{color:"#d9534f"},children:"\u26A0\uFE0F Warning: Missing Variants Found!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["The following folders are missing ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"images-variants"}),":"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:missingVariants.map(folderId=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:folderId},folderId))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{fontStyle:"italic",color:"#b22222"},children:["Please add ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"images-variants"})," for these folders."]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"#5cb85c"},children:"\u2705 All folders have images-variants."})]});}export default MissingVariantsChecker;
